column1: #text=Me and my friend decided we would bake a cake for our best friends birthday as opposed to purchasing it from a bakery like we usually do .
#text=First we headed out to the grocery store to pick up our baking supplies .
#text=My friend took care of the appliances and pans while I handle the flour , sugar , frosting , and eggs .
#text=When we arrived home we cleaned our utensils and began to bake the cake .
#text=First we started by pouring the cake batter in the bowl and cracking two eggs into the powder .
#text=Next we beat the mixture with a mixer until it was a creamy texture .
#text=We added the sugar , the flour , and the chocolate for an extra boost of flavor .
#text=Finally Our cake was nice and mixed so we set the oven to three hundred fifty degrees and baked the cake .
#text=While the cake was baking my friend prepared the homemade vanilla frosting .
#text=After an hour we took the cake out of the oven and were met with an amazing aroma .
#text=We decorated the cake with our homemade vanilla frosting and placed the cake in a glass cover so that it would remain fresh for our friend that night .
